changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Possibilité de mettre des labels pour le: Possibility to put labels for the different conditions (optional but allows to execute a scenario following a positioning of the shutter for example

index.md.Ce plugin vous permet de gerer plus faci: This plugin allows you to more easily manage the position of your shutters according to the position of the sun
index.md.un article montrant un exemple de config: an article showing an example configuration of the plugin
index.md.Rien de spécial ici juste à installer et: Nothing special here just to install and activate the plugin
index.md.Le plugin va regler la position de vos v: The plugin will adjust the position of your shutters relative to sun positions (Azimuth and Altitude) depending on condition
index.md.La configuration se decompose en plusieu: The configuration is broken down into several tabs
index.md.Vous retrouvez dans le premier onglet to: You will find in the first tab all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.rend votre équipement visible sur le das: makes your equipment visible on the dashboard
index.md.fréquence de verification des conditions: frequency of checking the conditions and position of the flaps
index.md.interdit au systeme de gestion de volet: prohibits the shutter management system from changing its position if it has been moved manually
index.md.Exemple le systeme ferme le volet, vous: Example the system closes the shutter, you open it it will no longer touch it until the "Resume management" command is triggered or if the recovery time has passed
index.md.la latitude de votre volet\/maison: the latitude of your shutter / house
index.md.la longitude de votre volet\/maison: the longitude of your shutter / house
index.md.l'altitude de votre volet\/maison: the height of your shutter / house
index.md.commande indiquant la position actuel du: command indicating the current position of the flap
index.md.commande permettant de rafraichir la pos: command to refresh the position of the shutter
index.md.temps pour faire un mouvement complet (d: time to make a complete movement (from top to bottom or from bottom to top), in seconds
index.md.si cette condition n'est pas vrai le plu: if this condition is not true the plugin will not modify the position of the shutter
index.md.si coché alors un changement de mode du: if checked then a change of mode of the shutter returns it to automatic management
index.md.Les actions immédiate sont systématique: Immediate actions are systematic and priority
index.md.si coché alors les actions immediate s'e: if checked then immediate actions are executed even if it is suspended and without taking into account the order of conditions
index.md.Le tableau des conditions vous permet de: The conditions table allows you to specify specific positioning conditions, which takes hold of the flap position table
index.md.si la condition est vrai, la position du: if the condition is true, the position of the flaps
index.md.la condition ne marche que si le volet e: the condition only works if the shutter is in this mode (you can put several separated by
index.md.Si ce champs n'est pas remplis alors la: If this field is not filled then the condition will be tested whatever the mode
index.md.On parle ici du mode du volet cela N'A R: We are talking about the shutter mode here IT'S NOTHING TO SEE with the mode plugin
index.md.agit immediatement dès que la condition: acts immediately as soon as the condition is true (so do not wait for the verification cron
index.md.si la condition est vrai elle suspend la: if the condition is true it suspends the automatic management of the shutter
index.md.le % quand le volet est ouvert: the% when the shutter is open
index.md.le % quand le volet est fermé: the% when the shutter is closed
index.md.l'action par defaut si aucune condition: the default action if no condition and position is valid
index.md.C'est ici que vous allez pouvoir gerer l: This is where you will be able to manage the positioning of the shutter according to the position of the sun
index.md.angle de hauteur du soleil: angle of height of the sun
index.md.position du volet à prendre si le soleil: position of the shutter to take if the sun is in the Azimuth and elevation limits
index.md.condition en plus à satisfaire pour que: additional condition to satisfy for the shutter to take this position (can be empty
index.md.qui permet, une fois votre adresse rentr: which allows, once your address entered, to see the position of the sun (and therefore the azimuth and elevation angles) according to the hours of the day (just drag the small sun at the top
index.md.Vous voyez ici les plannification de pos: Here you can see the positioning plans of the shutter made in the Agenda planning
index.md.angle Azimuth actuel du soleil: current azimuth angle of the sun
index.md.angle d'élevation actuel du soleil: current elevation angle of the sun
index.md.force le calcul de position du volet en: forces the shutter position to be calculated according to the position of the sun and the conditions and applies the result to it regardless of the management state (paused or not
index.md.derniere position demandé au volet par l: last position requested from the shutter by the plugin
index.md.force la remise en mode automatique de l: force the return to automatic management mode (Note that this command must be launched to return to automatic management if you have changed the position of your shutter manually and checked the box "Do not regain control"
index.md.mets à jour les valeurs des commandes \": update the values of the "Sun azimuth" and "Sun elevation" commands
index.md.Vous pouvez ajouter des commandes \"mode: You can add "mode" commands, the command name will be the mode name
index.md.Le plugin possede un panel de gestion en: The plugin has a desktop and mobile management panel to activate it just go to Plugins -> Plugin management, click on the pane management plugin and at the very bottom right of ticking the boxes to display the panel desktop and mobile
